/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on field examinations and evidentiary considerations for Philippine cases, including
when to request a field examination for Philippine cases
when a field examination is not required for Philippine cases
acceptable evidence
how to handle conflicting information
required action on letters alleging payee non-entitlement
when further development is required on alleged non-entitlement
when development establishes factual basis for award suspension,
and
when further development is not required for letters alleging nonentitlement
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
